齤字的基本解释

齤
quán
缺齿。
曲齿。
露齿：“若士者齤然而笑。”

齤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［quán］
［《廣韻》巨員切，平仙，羣。］
(1)缺齿。一说齿不正。
(2)见“齤然”。

齤字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【齒字部】　齤； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1533第33
【唐韻】巨員切【集韻】逵員切，?音權。【說文】缺齒也。一曰曲齒。一曰笑而見齒貌。【淮南子·道應訓】若士者齤然而笑。

齤字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
齤字的起名意思

暂无。

齤
Basic explanation of words
齤
quán
Missing teeth.
Curved teeth.
Toothy: "If someone laughs sharply."
齤
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［quán］
["Guangyun" giant cut, flat fairy, group. ]
(1) Missing teeth. He said that his teeth were not right.
(2) See "Jianran".
齤
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Ji 2] [Tooth Word Department] 　齤; Kangxi strokes: 21; page number: page 1533 33
[Tang Yun] Giant members cut [Ji Yun] Kui members cut, right? [Said the text] Missing teeth. One is curved teeth. One said, smile and see the appearance of the tooth. [Huainanzi·Tao Yingxun] If the scholar laughs sharply.
齤
Source glyph
Character evolution: Xiaozhuan
Italics
Font comparison: Song Ti, Mainland China
Taiwan Minutes
Hong Kong Mingti
Korean Ming Dynasty
齤
Name meaning
Nothing.
quán
гл.
1) не хватать, недоставать (о зубах); щербатый
2) оскаливать зубы (в улыбке); осклабиться
